name: nfcxfrdf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: A utility lemma to transfer a bound-variable hypothesis builder into a definition. (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2020.)
